description: W-2 Infrastructure Integration - Set up database connectivity with Neon PostgreSQL via Drizzle ORM, authentication with Clerk, and deployment to Vercel

userStories.title: Create Drizzle database connection module
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a database connection module so that the app can query Neon PostgreSQL.
acceptanceCriteria: Use `DATABASE_URL` environment variable for connection string
Export `db` instance for use throughout the app

userStories.title: Create database health check API route
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a health check endpoint to verify database connectivity works in all environments.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns `{ status: "error", database: "disconnected" }` with 500 status on failure
Executes simple query (`SELECT 1`) to verify connection

userStories.title: Add Clerk provider to application
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Clerk integrated so users can authenticate.

userStories.title: Create Clerk middleware for route protection
userStories.description: As a developer, I need middleware to protect dashboard routes from unauthenticated access.

userStories.title: Create sign-in and sign-up pages
userStories.description: As a user, I need sign-in and sign-up pages so I can authenticate with the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Pages are centered and styled for dark mode

userStories.title: Create protected dashboard layout
userStories.description: As a user, I need a dashboard layout that only appears when I'm signed in.
acceptanceCriteria: Layout includes header with app name "Mjolnir"
Header includes `<UserButton />` component from Clerk (shows avatar, sign-out)
Dark mode styling consistent with design principles

userStories.title: Create dashboard home page
userStories.description: As a user, I need a dashboard home page as the main entry point after signing in.
acceptanceCriteria: Displays welcome message with user's first name (from Clerk)
Shows placeholder text: "Net worth tracking coming soon"
Page is protected (redirects to sign-in if not authenticated)

userStories.title: Create user profile page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view and manage my profile settings.
acceptanceCriteria: Accessible from UserButton dropdown or direct navigation

userStories.title: Create public landing page
userStories.description: As a visitor, I need a landing page that explains the app and lets me sign in.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows app name "Mjolnir" and tagline "Personal Net Worth Tracker"
If already signed in, shows "Go to Dashboard" button instead

userStories.title: Configure Vercel deployment
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the app deployed to Vercel with automatic deployments.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `vercel.json` with any required configuration (or confirm defaults suffice)
Verify build succeeds locally with `npm run build`

userStories.title: Add environment variable documentation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need clear documentation of all environment variables for local and production setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `.env.example` with all required variables (comments explaining each)
Add setup instructions to README.md (or create if not exists)
